pr_title: Fixing subscriptions are auto assigning issue to new versions

timeline.message: Fixing subscriptions are auto assigning issue to new versions

timeline.bodyText: what is that magic number 1 ? :P Please use a constant
timeline.author: malinthaprasan

replies.bodyText:
It picked the checkItem of "Requires re-subscription when to publish the API" from checkItem List

Requires re-subscription when to publish the API - 1
Deprecate old versions after publishing the API - 0
replies.author: HiranyaKavishani

timeline.message: Adding require-re-subscription check item as constant
